languages.text: Прямо на глазах пятна омерзительных личинок принялись расползаться, уничтожая провиант. Никто не решился подойти к ящикам, и до конца полета сквозь Имматериум этот трюм оставался изолированным. После выхода его долго не осмеливались осмотреть, а когда все-таки открыли шлюз, оказалось, что порча была лишь мороком.

traits.locale_text: Прямо на глазах пятна омерзительных личинок принялись расползаться, уничтожая провиант. Никто не решился подойти к ящикам, и до конца полета сквозь Имматериум этот трюм оставался изолированным. После выхода его долго не осмеливались осмотреть, а когда все-таки открыли шлюз, оказалось, что порча была лишь мороком.

languages.text: The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.
languages.original_text: Прямо на глазах пятна омерзительных личинок принялись расползаться, уничтожая провиант. Никто не решился подойти к ящикам, и до конца полета сквозь Имматериум этот трюм оставался изолированным. После выхода его долго не осмеливались осмотреть, а когда все-таки открыли шлюз, оказалось, что порча была лишь мороком.

traits.locale_text: The disgusting larvae kept spreading and defiling the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. After the ship left the Sea of Souls the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it, and when he finally did, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

The disgusting larvae kept spreading and defiling the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. After the ship left the Sea of Souls the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it, and when he finally did, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

languages.text: 恶心的蛆虫继续滋生，破坏了粮食供应。没人敢靠近储藏食物的板条箱。箱子一直处于密封状态，直到旅程的最后一刻为止。离开灵魂之海后，军需官没敢立刻去检查箱子内的情况。当他终于鼓起勇气去检查时，才发现先前的污染不过是幻觉罢了。
languages.original_text: The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

traits.locale_text: 恶心的蛆虫继续滋生，破坏了粮食供应。没人敢靠近储藏食物的板条箱。箱子一直处于密封状态，直到旅程的最后一刻为止。离开灵魂之海后，军需官没敢立刻去检查箱子内的情况。当他终于鼓起勇气去检查时，才发现先前的污染不过是幻觉罢了。

languages.text: Las repugnantes larvas empezaron a propagarse, arruinando las provisiones. Nadie se atrevió a acercarse a las cajas, y el compartimento permaneció sellado hasta el final del viaje. Al salir del Mar de Almas, el intendente no tuvo prisa por inspeccionarlo. Cuando por fin se armó de valor, resultó que la contaminación había sido solo una ilusión.
languages.original_text: The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

traits.locale_text: Las repugnantes larvas empezaron a propagarse, arruinando las provisiones. Nadie se atrevió a acercarse a las cajas, y el compartimento permaneció sellado hasta el final del viaje. Al salir del Mar de las Almas, el intendente no tuvo prisa por inspeccionarlo. Cuando por fin se armó de valor, resultó que la contaminación había sido solo una ilusión.

languages.text: 気味の悪い虫がどんどん広がって、貯蔵品をダメにした。わざわざ箱に近付く者はなく、当該エリアは航行の終わりまでそのまま封鎖された。魂の海を離れても、補給係は急いでそれを検査することはしない。彼がついに勇気を振り絞ったとき、汚染は幻想で、それ以上でも以下でもないことが分かったのだった。
languages.original_text: The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

traits.locale_text: 気味の悪い虫がどんどん広がって、貯蔵品をダメにした。わざわざ箱に近付く者はなく、当該エリアは航行の終わりまでそのまま封鎖された。魂の海を離れても、補給係は急いでそれを検査することはしない。彼がついに勇気を振り絞ったとき、汚染は幻想で、それ以上でも以下でもないことが分かったのだった。

languages.text: Les répugnantes larves commencent à se répandre et contaminent le reste des provisions. Personne n'ose plus s'approcher des caisses, et le compartiment est scellé jusqu'à la fin du voyage. Après que le vaisseau a quitté la Mer des Âmes, le quartier-maître n'est pas des plus enclin à l'inspecter, mais il finit par trouver le courage d'y jeter un coup d'œil, et il s'avère que la contamination n'était rien de plus qu'une illusion.
languages.original_text: The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

traits.locale_text: Les répugnantes larves commencent à se répandre et contaminent le reste des provisions. Personne n'ose plus s'approcher des caisses, et le compartiment est scellé jusqu'à la fin du voyage. Après que le vaisseau a quitté la Mer des Âmes, le quartier-maître n'est pas des plus enclin à l'inspecter, mais il finit par trouver le courage d'y jeter un coup d'œil, et il s'avère que la contamination n'était rien de plus qu'une illusion.

languages.text: Die widerwärtigen Larven breiten sich weiter aus und ruinieren die Vorräte. Niemand wagt es, sich den Kisten zu nähern, und das Schott bleibt bis zum Ende der Reise versiegelt. Als das Schiff das Meer der Seelen verlässt, ist der Quartiermeister in keiner großen Eile, die Vorräte zu inspizieren. Als er schließlich den Mut dazu aufbringt, stellt sich heraus, dass die Kontamination nur eine Illusion war.
languages.original_text: The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.

Als das Schiff das Meer der Seelen verlässt, ist der Quartiermeister in keiner großen Eile, die Vorräte zu inspizieren. Als er schließlich den Mut dazu aufbringt, stellt sich heraus, dass die Kontamination nur eine Illusion war.

languages.text: İğrenç larvalar, yayılıp erzakları mahvetmeye başladı. Hiç kimse sandıklara yaklaşmaya cesaret edemedi ve kompartıman, yolculuğun sonuna kadar mühürlü kaldı. Ruhlar Denizi'nden çıkıldığında levazım subayı, bu alanı incelemekte acele etmedi. Nihayet cesaretini toplayıp incelediğinde ise bozulmanın sadece bir yanılsamadan ibaret olduğu ortaya çıktı.
languages.original_text: The disgusting larvae started to spread, ruining the provisions. No one dared to approach the crates, and the compartment remained sealed until the very end of the journey. Upon leaving the Sea of Souls, the quartermaster was in no hurry to inspect it. When he finally gathered the courage, it turned out the contamination had been an illusion and nothing more.
